transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Ji sir boliye.

Executive: Sir main bhi se baat kar rahe hain kya?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Sir India Mart se bol raha tha Noida head office se. Sir ji aapka jo profile tha sir us profile ko closer ke liye dal diya hai. Aapka jitne din ki bhi service remaining hai wo sara paisa sir aapke account me credit ho jayega 10 to 15 working days me.

Customer: Jitne din ki bhi service gaya?

Executive: Aapki service jitni bhi bachi hui hai hamare paas me. Wo service ka paisa aapke account me sir credit ho jayega 10 to 15 working days me.

Customer: Sir ye aapne request kab dali hui hai?

Executive: Request to kafi pehle se pada hua hai lekin jab wo approved hoga sir uske baad hi process ho payega. Request to dala hi hua hai jis din se aapka concern open hai. Sir yaani ki jo bhi service chal rahi hai wo matlab chal rahi hai. Hum chahe. Sir wo service hamare paas aisa koi option nahi hota hai ki hum service ko beech me interkyuki ye sab server pe promote hoti hai. To pehli cheez to sir dobara me wo. Ye to aapne hi delay kiya hai.

Customer: Humne to bahut time pehle se bol diya tha ki humne nahi use karna.

Executive: To hamari apni bhi kuch policies hoti hai na sir. To dono ka cooperation se hi ho payega na. Sir aapki policy me sirf aap hi ki policy according chalu hum nahi aap nahi samjhoge. Hame samjhna padega jo bhi hai.

Customer: Nahi aisa nahi hai hum to ye hum nahi samjhana sir ki aapki jo che mahine ki jo service bachi hui hai uske hum paisa aapko wapas kar rahe hain. Wo humne hi samjhana sir che se saat mahine ki jo service bacha hai wapas kar rahe hain. Warna humne hamare end se to koi problem nahi hai humne to aapki service already run kar rahe the. Use aapko kar rahe the bahut sare seller hai jo nahi use karte hain sir koi kisi se busy schedule hai koi kisi reason se to iska matlab India Mart ne to mana nahi kiya na sir kisi ko use nahi karne ke liye. Aapki taraf se bhi hai wo aapne nahi samajhni wo baat alag hai. Sir AI me nahi problem services ka sir use karne se. Sir ka sirf ye nahi hota ki hamari taraf se nahi use ho raha to isliye humne band karni hai.

Customer: Aage se bhi satisfaction na ho zero result ho. Sir satisfaction service industries me satisfaction word jo hota hai wo uses ke upar hi hota hai na agar main koi kahi se koi service lunga.

Executive: Agar me hum har cheez ko koi aadmi kahi na kahi koi na koi service avail kar raha hai sir agar main service liya.

Customer: Sir ye kya baatein karte hain. To sir same baat yahi jab iska solution hai sir to main yahi bolunga na. Refund karna hai karo. Theek hai uske baad main aapke complaint dal raha hu mujhe jahan se refund lena hoga compensation leni hogi wo milega theek hai nahi milega to meri marzi. Meri kismat.

Executive: Aap apna kaam karo main apna karta hu kyu tension le rahe ho sir.

Customer: Aap seedha seedha kar doge hum acche se sahi se baat kar rahe hain. Nahi maan rahe ho theek hai.

Executive: Dekhiye ek ek cheez ho sakta hai aapka jo October se refund jab jab aapne request dali thi mere paas wo aapne October me dala tha. 27 October ko aapki pehli 15 October ko aapki pehli request sorry. 10 October ko aapki pehli request aayi thi. Jyada se jyada ye sakta to main October se consider kara sakta hu 10 October se main consider kara sakta hu. Main request pehle jab aapka ye plan hai na. Aapke executive ne mujhe chipkaya.

Customer: Nahi sir executive hamare sales karte hain product ko deni wo alag baat hai aapne record mujhe bhi share kiya tha. Har koi executive sales karta hai aur har koi executive customer ko bolta hai ki aap use karenge to aapko benefit hoga. Accha benefit hoga buyers aayenge calls aayenge ye common baat hai sir aur aate bhi hain log business karte bhi hain.

Customer: Ye business karte bhi hain agar aap use kiye hote. Refund chahiye mujhe meri amount wapas kar do ya jo plan chal raha hai aapka next chal rahi hai wo close kar do. Unhone as a said ye bola hai ki aap isko increase karo. Nahi kabhi nahi ye complaint to pehli baar aayi hai main batata hu. Plan chipka ke apna target pura karke aap khud job chhod ke chale gaye hai to usme mera nuksan ho raha hai. Maine to bahut pehle se bol diya tha. 10 October ko aapne nahi wo sir dekho jo aapne customer care pe dala 10 October ko aapne dala hai waha se hum aapka consider kara sakte hain. pehle bhi calls ja chuki hai 969. Wo hamare paas sir aisa koi record nahi hai jahan pe ki main aapke paas aapke paas recording hai lekin aapne jab customer care pe dala. Sir aisa to hamare paas customer har customer ke second baat hoga ki main business refund karo. Aap bhi to samajh sakte hain sir ki koi company kisi ko member isliye nahi banati ki uska paisa refund karne ke liye aur hamare yaha services aapke product me hum use kar rahe hain business kar bhi rahe hain. To hum to yahi bolenge na ki aap use karke business kariye sir.

Executive: Sir main agar aapko kisi ne commitment diya tha to sir abhi tak aapne share karna chahiye. Sir saaf si baat hai aap jitna marzi. Result to kabhi nahi aaya sir result ki to koi guarantee nahi hoti India Mart me. Result ki to guarantee nahi karte hain. yahi sabhi sun raha hu.

Customer: Sir result hum commit nahi karte sir to main kaise bolu ye baat. 50 logon se baat ho chuki hai sabhi ne ek hi baat hai. Sabhi bolenge. Ha ki nahi hota result ki commitment nahi hai sir. To sir jo jo hamara product ki jo USP wo to batayenge na ki hum business commit kaise agar business se commitment hota sir aapne plus point batana hai. To plus point hai na service use karodo ka business karte hain. Yahi hai hi nahi plus point hai hi aapka minus me. to main kyu continue karu. Aapke product me hamare paas seller hai jo ki sir lakhon ka business kar rahe hain. Kids bicycle me mere paas me jo seller hai ab aap kisi bhi city se bolo main aise hazar plus seller India Mart pe registered hai jo ki accha khasa business kar rahe hain. Ab hum ye kaise maan le sir ji aap bol rahe aap use to kiye nahi sir service hamari puri acche tarike se aap seedhe India Mart ko bole ki. Meri baat suno mujhe use nahi karni aati aapki service to bahut acchi hai chhodo rehne do refund karo baat khatam karo.

Executive: Ha theek hai main usko process kara raha hu aapka consider karke last se main aapka process kara raha hu. Theek hai. Ha isko jab se start hua hai tab se isko refund karo. Nahi jab se ye hota.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund for unused service.

- Claims executive misrepresented plan benefits.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to process refund request.

- Agreed to consider refund from October 10th.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will process the refund request.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, misrepresentation, customer service
